title: Auto-unblock stories when their blocker completes
description: When a story completes, any stories blocked by it should auto-move from blocked to pending. Currently this requires manual intervention.

acceptanceCriteria.text: After marking story complete, scan blocked array for stories with blockedBy === completedStoryId
For each match: remove blockedBy from story file, move from blocked to pending array
Update nextStory if pending was empty before unblock
Test: Complete a story, verify dependent story moves to pending
Test: Verify chain reaction (A blocks B blocks C, complete A, both B and C eventually unblock)
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: fix: BUG-006 auto-unblock stories when blocker completes
